website_summaries.verdict: This sliding door cabinet is lit with 4 incandescent bulbs and a switch to operate.
pros: Doors slide, allowing you to keep an eye on the mirror as you access your products in the cabinet
Can work as a replacement for older style cabinets
cons: This unit does not include an extra electrical outlet

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: While this product fit the look we needed for our older to home, it is in my opinion far more expensive than it should be. It is light and easy to install and fits nicely in a smaller bathroom. Unfortunately there are not many medicine cabinets of this type on the market. You get what you pay but in this case you over pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Cabinet and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Cabinet and easy to install. Just the right size and the 4 bulb light is very bright. Perfect addition to my bath!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Evaline

customer_reviews.title: Unit is just OK
customer_reviews.text: The unit is OK. The glass mirrors are supposed to slide in a track to open and close. If you don't use the correct amount of pressure, or if they are tilted in the track just a bit, the mirrors get jammed. If I were doing the project again, I'd look around more.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with how flimsy this medicine cabinet is compared to the 40 year old one we were replacing. It works, but I don't expect it to wear as well as it's predessor.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Worked Fine
customer_reviews.text: The quality is ok (not great) for the price. All the parts were included for assembly and it was packed well to keep the mirrors from breaking during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Dweller

customer_reviews.title: No electrical outlet as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality - just what we needed, except that the manufacturer description says it has an electrical outlet and it doesn’t. Not as advertised and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good medecine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money, lighting in mirror could be better but lights the room.
customer_reviews.author: Francis E. Murphy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: medical cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Love the new medical cabinet. Replaced one of almost the same design. Made nice and most important the wife likes it.
customer_reviews.author: bcsclan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit just fine and nice product. Seems like the steel is thinner now.; from 1975
customer_reviews.author: C G Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install The only problem was to remove protective film from a guide
customer_reviews.author: arkady

customer_reviews.title: ... wanted I haven't put it up yet but it's like my old
customer_reviews.text: It exactly what I wanted I haven't put it up yet but it's like my old one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit for replacement one I had I like it
customer_reviews.author: skeet

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality overall, the sheet metal around the sides and back could be a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: tipiw

customer_reviews.title: Medicine cabinet reveiw
customer_reviews.text: Medicine cabinet was fine but it was not as described. In the description It claimed to have a outlet but it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Dosen't have grounded outlet.
customer_reviews.text: It states in product description that it has grounded outlet. It dosen't.
customer_reviews.author: Izmir

customer_reviews.title: It was a very nice replacement for the one
customer_reviews.text: It was a very nice replacement for the one. It lights up the very small bathroom in an older home.
customer_reviews.author: Atlease

product_meta.title: Jensen 323LPX Lighted 2-Sliding Doors Medicine Cabinet, 24" x 19.5"
product_meta.description: Style:New PackagingThe sliding mirror doors of the Jensen flair 323Lp allow access to what you need and still never lose sight of yourself in the mirror. A standard of the industry, this cabinet works with any bath or powder room design. Four integral 60-watt incandescent lights (bulbs not included) ensure a well-lit environment. Grounded outlet and on/off switch provide the convenience of electricity right where you need it. Surface mount design provides an unlimited number of places to install the cabinet exactly where you want it. Polished stainless steel framed, polished glass mirror provides a clean and modern feel to blend seamlessly with any décor. Removable, fixed steel shelf allows you to store necessities, so all the items you want to keep handy are always within reach. Welded steel body has a durable heat cured white acrylic paint finish to provide a sturdy cabinet for long life expectancy and rust resistance. Over-pack carton provides additional product protection to ensure your purchase arrives damage free. Overall dimensions: 24 W x 19-1/2 h x 7-1/2 d-inch.
feature_bullets: Stainless steel Frame; sliding mirror doors
Integral on/off switch; 4 60 watt incandescent bulbs required
Welded steel body finished with rust resistant treated steel and heat cured white Acrylic paint

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars28 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
